Package com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.program

Class Program

java.lang.Object
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.utils.Observable
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.program.Program
public class Program extends Observable
This class contains the contents, the name of program and whether it is edited or not
Author:
Jonas Pohl

    • Program

      public Program(File f, String name)
      Creates and loads a program from a given file and the program name
      Parameters:
      f - the file on the fileSystem storing the program
      name - the name of the program

  • Method Details

    • getFile

      public File getFile()
      Returns:
      the file corresponding to this program

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the program

    • getEditorContent

      public String getEditorContent()
      Returns:
      the real content of the editor

    • setEditorContent

      public void setEditorContent(String content)
      Sets the editorContent and notifies all Observers, namely the MainStageController to update the textEditors content.
      Parameters:
      content - the new content

    • save

      public void save(String text)
      saves the text of the editor-content into the corresponding file It does only save the given text, if the changes were made
      Parameters:
      text - the text to save in the file

    • save

      public void save()
      Forces the program to be saved even if it might not be edited.

    • setEdited

      public void setEdited(boolean flag)
      Sets the edited flag
      Parameters:
      flag - the value of the edited flag

    • isEdited

      public boolean isEdited()
      returns whether the editor-content has changed
      Returns:
      true if content is edited, false otherwise

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Setter for the name attribute.
      Parameters:
      newName - the new name for the program
